metadata.title: CVE-2022-0998 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s virtio devicedriver code in the way a user triggers the vhost_vdpa_config_validatefunction. This flaw allows a local user to crash or potentially escalatetheir privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
